member.name: T:ConstTypeArgs.Console.Color.K_ConsoleColor
member.summary: The interface provides a more explicit IConstTypeArg<ConsoleColor> derived type.
member.remarks:
Implement this interface when defining
System.ConsoleColor const type arguments rather than K_Enum<ConsoleColor> or IConstTypeArg<ConsoleColor>. In uncommon scenarios where they need to be instantiated, use instead.

member.name: T:ConstTypeArgs.Console.Color.K_ConsoleColor.__
member.summary: The interface is a discard argument meant to signify a lack of value and is used as a placeholder in type parameter lists. When combined with other discard arguments of other types, it can be used to create union-like behavior.

member.name: T:ConstTypeArgs.Console.Color.K_ConsoleColor`1
member.summary: The interface provides a more explicit IConstTypeArg<ConsoleColor, K_ConsoleColor<TSelf>> derived type.
member.remarks: Implement this interface for /// System.ConsoleColor const type arguments in uncommon scenarios where they need to be instantiated. Otherwise, use instead.

member.summary: The class provides a const argument provider that wraps the System.ConsoleColor value from another const argument provider.
member.typeparam: The const argument provider type containing the value to wrap.
member.remarks: This class can be used to create domain-specific const type arguments or to wrap const type arguments for reuse in other contexts.

member.name: T:ConstTypeArgs.Console.Key.K_SpecialKey
member.summary: The interface provides a more explicit IConstTypeArg<ConsoleSpecialKey> derived type.
member.remarks:
Implement this interface when defining
System.ConsoleSpecialKey const type arguments rather than K_Enum<ConsoleSpecialKey> or IConstTypeArg<ConsoleSpecialKey>. In uncommon scenarios where they need to be instantiated, use instead.

member.name: T:ConstTypeArgs.Console.Key.K_SpecialKey.__
member.summary: The interface is a discard argument meant to signify a lack of value and is used as a placeholder in type parameter lists. When combined with other discard arguments of other types, it can be used to create union-like behavior.

member.name: T:ConstTypeArgs.Console.Key.K_SpecialKey`1
member.summary: The interface provides a more explicit IConstTypeArg<ConsoleSpecialKey, K_ConsoleSpecialKey<TSelf>> derived type.
member.remarks: Implement this interface for /// System.ConsoleSpecialKey const type arguments in uncommon scenarios where they need to be instantiated. Otherwise, use instead.

member.name: T:ConstTypeArgs.Console.Key.SpecialKey`1
member.summary: The class provides a const argument provider that wraps the System.ConsoleSpecialKey value from another const argument provider.
member.typeparam: The const argument provider type containing the value to wrap.
member.remarks: This class can be used to create domain-specific const type arguments or to wrap const type arguments for reuse in other contexts.

member.name: T:ConstTypeArgs.Console.Key.SpecialKeys
member.summary: The static class encapsulates const type arguments for ConsoleSpecialKey.ControlBreak and ConsoleSpecialKey.ControlC.
